titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the reprinting of Senate Report 100-9, 100th Congress, 1st Session.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-55.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 117.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the reprinting of the report entitled "Developments in Aging" as a Senate document, including additional copies for the use of the Special Committee on Aging.
